text: 97.5 Sure FM is an FM radio station owned and operated by Iddes Broadcast Group. The station's studio is located in Tandag, Surigao del Sur, Philippines.Nutrition School-on-the-Air (NSOA) Graduation of Tandag CityLumad leader arrested after radio interview in TandagGroup hits arrest of indigenous leaderSOA in Surigao del Sur for the Third Time ==References== Category:Radio stations in Surigao del Sur
